Introduction

Park Chanyeol is a South Korean rapper, singer, songwriter, and actor. He debuted in 2012 as a member of the South Korean boy group EXO and its sub-unit EXO-K.

Chanyeol is a part of the subunit EXO-SC along with member Sehun. They debuted on July 22, 2019 with their song "What a Life".

In November 2019, Chanyeol launched a YouTube channel named "Studio NNG" for a project, in collaboration with an SM Entertainment Director MQ who also is a part of the performance group BeatBurger.

Chanyeol enlisted as an active-duty soldier on March 29, 2021, and ended his military service on September 27, 2022.
